wms_article.title: LG CNS certified by AWS, Google, and Microsoft for GenAI

wms_article_body.body: LG CNS is now the first Korean company to obtain generative AI certifications from all three major global cloud providers - Amazon Web Services (AWS), Google Cloud, and Microsoft Azure. The company announced on Thursday that it had received Microsoft’s “Specialization in Building AI Applications on Azure,” following prior certifications from AWS and Google. This achievement demonstrates LG CNS’s comprehensive capabilities in designing, deploying, and operating AI applications on Azure. Microsoft grants the certification only to partners that meet rigorous standards, including verified business performance, technical expertise, third-party audits, successful customer use cases, and internal workforce development.
